Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Crime | Drama
Status: Returning Series
Network: ITV1 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: September 27, 2010
Episode Order: 6

DCI Banks is based on the successful detective novel written by crime writer Peter Robinson. The series stars Stephen Tompkinson as DCI Banks. Two young policemen are sent to a house following a report of a domestic disturbance and they end up discovering a horrific scene. DCI Alan Banks ends up being pushed to the absolute limits in the case after the identity of a serial killer has finally been revealed. His capture though is only the beginning of a shocking investigation.

The first series was known by the title DCI Banks: Aftermath. The second series saw the detective investigating more cases. 
(http://www.tvrage.com/DCI_Banks-Aftermath)
